sentence: In early trading on Tuesday, shares of Procter & Gamble ( PG ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 4.4%.
Year to date, Procter & Gamble registers a 10.6% gain.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is 3M ( MMM ), trading down 2.9%.
3M is showing a gain of 10.4% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Home Depot ( HD ), trading down 2.2%, and United Technologies ( UTX ), trading up 1.0% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
